name: TrainingR00M: First Buffer
description:
"Pleiades protocol initiated. Running NewAI onboarding script..."

TrainingR00M is a first-person, puzzle-platform adventure set in a virtual reality known as The Datascape. Nothing is known about why you're here, or what came before, but it is evident that the only way is forward.

Explore The Datascape, reveal its secrets, and find your purpose.

(This is a playable demo of a work-in-progress game, with free updates planned over time.)

RECOMMENDED SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

These are the recommended specifications. The game may run just fine on lesser hardware but experiences may vary.

  • Operating System: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB VRAM
  • System Memory: 8GB
  • Storage: 500 MB
